comment.author: 14147803@N03
comment._content: They appear to be using the Hotchkiss M1914 machine gun. At the time of the photograph they would have been quite new. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hotchkiss_M1914_machine_gun

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
This picture most likely may be date-corraled on february 9-18, 1913, during the Ten Tragic Days in Mexico City.
Roberto Duarte M D

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: Notice in the lower right corner the signature "Melhado Foto", prop(riertor, rierty...), which most likely stands for Eduardo Melhado who took several pictures in Mexico City during the ten tragic days in februry 1913. So the creator should be him. Learn about Eduardo Melhado in miguelangelmorales-fotografos.blogspot.mx/2009/03/eduardo...

comment.author: 34985608@N03
comment._content: jerodamor: Seems likely that the photograph was taken by Eduardo Melhado in 1913. We'll add a note next time we update the catalog record. Thanks!
